entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches spreading inland late this evening and overnight. Low 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 22 June 2020

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 26 except temperature steady near 19 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches retreating to the coast. High 26 except temperature steady near 19 along parts of the coast. Humidex 31. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 22 June 2020
